name: Hentai Oni
description:
Hentai Oni is a relaxing puzzle game.
With the theme of oni and 24 unique sexy girls.
Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.GamePlaySwap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.
Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.FeatureSexy girls pictures & Relaxing music
Fullview mode after completing a level
"Enter" key to quickly complete the current level
" ← →" arrow keys to quickly switch between levels
